alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 2:39PM CDT until April 19 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washington County in southeastern Wisconsin... Northeastern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 239 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Horicon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mayville, Horicon, Juneau, Lomira, Theresa, Iron Ridge, Burnett, Addison, Woodland, Kekoskee, Nenno, Atwater, Allenton, Knowles, and Minnesota Junction. This includes the following Location Horicon Marsh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
